comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: LOC, note typo "Duke Bernhard". This is Bernhard III, Duke of Saxe-Meiningen, "Bernhard III Frederick Wilhelm Albrecht Georg, Duke of Saxe-Meiningen (b. Meiningen, 1 April 1851 – d. Meiningen, 16 January 1928), was the last reigning duke of Saxe-Meiningen." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bernhard_III,_Duke_of_Saxe-Meiningen More info on German Wikipedia: de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bernhard_III._(Sachsen-Meiningen)

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog: Thanks for catching the typo which we will fix, and for the additional information about Bernhard III.  We will add some to the image description when we update.
